user_query: My company is organizing a team-building event and we want to incorporate some fun activities. Can you provide us with a list of popular songs to create a playlist? Additionally, suggest some team-building games and icebreaker activities to engage everyone.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of popular songs suitable for team-building events.
Suggest a variety of team-building games that can be conducted indoors and outdoors.
Provide a selection of icebreaker activities to engage participants during the event.
